information.name: sms-generic-api
information.description: This plugin sends notifications via API. It was originally adapted from Twilio SMS notifier plugin for a different SMS service, but can in theory be used for any API notification service
information.author: Ubiquiti Networks, Inc.

configuration.label: API Message POST Body Template
configuration.description: The template for the API POST body in JSON format. The template must contain both variables in this example: E.g. {"to":"%%clientNumber%%","message":"%%smsMessage%%","saveMessage":true}
